Hero.title: A calm, transparent path to buy, build, or renovate with confidence.
Hero.subtitle: We combine real estate advisory, vetted builders, and project accountability to create trust at every milestone.

Trust.title: Built to protect your investment
Trust.subtitle: Every step is documented, every partner is vetted, and every decision is guided by experienced advisors.

verified.title: Verified Build Partners
verified.description: Every contractor is vetted for licensing, insurance, and past performance before joining our network.

ledger.title: Transparent Project Ledger
ledger.description: Track costs, milestones, and selections in one dashboard with no surprise change orders.

council.title: Design Review Council
council.description: Architects and planners review each project to protect neighborhood integrity and resale value.

permits.title: Permits Managed
permits.description: We coordinate city approvals and inspections, keeping your timeline on track.

Trust.proofTitle: A track record backed by data
Trust.proofSubtitle: We earn trust by delivering measurable outcomes and transparent reporting.

Services.title: One studio for every stage
Services.subtitle: We guide buyers, sellers, and property owners with the same disciplined process for every project.

buySell.title: Buy & Sell
buySell.description: Market analysis, pricing strategy, and elevated marketing for buyers and sellers.

newConstruction.title: New Construction
newConstruction.description: Select from curated floorplans or create a custom build with our design studio.

renovations.title: Renovations
renovations.description: Thoughtful upgrades to preserve character while improving performance and comfort.

propertyCare.title: Property Care
propertyCare.description: Ongoing management, leasing, and preventative maintenance programs.

Experience.title: High-touch, low-stress delivery
Experience.subtitle: We run a steady communication cadence and keep all teams accountable to the same timeline.

avery.quote: Rnewx delivered weekly transparency and zero surprises. We felt confident at every decision point.
avery.name: Avery Sutton

lina.quote: Their renovation process protected the home’s character while dramatically improving the layout.
lina.name: Lina Cho
